ComparisonOperatosTest.java

package hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw5.db.test;

import hr.fer.zemris.java.tecaj.hw5.db.ComparisonOperators.*;

import org.junit.Assert;
import org.junit.Test;

public class ComparisonOperatosTest {
	
	@Test
	public void GreatherThan_False_ComparingTwoStringsUTF8(){
		IComparisonOperator operator= new GreatherThan();
		Assert.assertFalse(operator.satisfied("Šimić","Zec" ));
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Zec", "Feldšar"));
	}
	
	@Test
	public void GreatherThanOrEqual_True_ComparingTwoStringsUTF8(){
		IComparisonOperator operator= new GreatherThanOrEqual();
		Assert.assertFalse(operator.satisfied("Šimić","Zec" ));
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Zec", "Zec"));
	}
	
	@Test
	public void SmallerThan_True_ComparingTwoStringsUTF8(){
		IComparisonOperator operator= new SmallerThan();
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Šimić","Zec" ));
		Assert.assertFalse(operator.satisfied("Zec","Zec" ));
	}
	
	@Test
	public void SmallerThanOrEqual_True_ComparingTwoStringsUTF8(){
		IComparisonOperator operator= new SmallerThanOrEqual();
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Šimić","Zec" ));
		Assert.assertFalse(operator.satisfied("Zec", "Akšamović"));
	}
	
	@Test
	public void Equal_True_ComparingTwoStringsUTF8(){
		IComparisonOperator operator= new Equal();
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Šimić","Ši*" ));
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Zec", "*ec"));
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Zec", "*"));
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Zec", "Zec"));
	}
	
	@Test
	public void NotEqual_True_ComparingTwoStringsUTF8(){
		IComparisonOperator operator= new NotEqual();
		Assert.assertTrue(operator.satisfied("Šimić","Zec" ));
		Assert.assertFalse(operator.satisfied("Zec","Zec" ));
		
	}
	
}
Created with JaCoCo 0.7.4.201502262128
